**The Golden Talisman Repentance Rite (Jīnluó Zhāichàn Fángyí)**

**Scripture Title:** *Golden Talisman Repentance Rite*
**One Scroll**
**Collected by Master Guangcheng Du Guangting (Tang Dynasty–Five Dynasties Period)**
**Source Text:** *Zhengtong Daozang* (Orthodox Daoist Canon), *Dòngxuán* (Cavernous Mystery) Section, *Wēiyí* (Ceremonial Etiquette) Category

**Golden Talisman Repentance Rite**
**Collected by Master Guangcheng Du Guangting**

**General Repentance Rite**

Humbly heard, the Primordial Origin unfolded the Diagram, pacifying the Five Directions and establishing their foundations;
The True Scripture manifested transformations, dividing the Ten Extremes to condense the radiance.
Encompassing all phenomena within divine mechanism, returning all merits to the Mysterious Existence.
Guarding the realm’s security, nurturing the august virtue of the Emperor.
Extending the Precious Treasure without end, disseminating boundless blessings within the finite.
Now, with reverence, the Emperor, merging with the Dao’s domain, contemplates the Mysterious Shore.
Aspiring to initiate the Great Sacrifice, bestowing ten thousand meanings below.
With solemn offerings of golden dragons and jade discs, oil lamps, incense, and flowers, silk banners inscribed with sacred symbols—
I beseech the unveiling of the Mysterious Essence, the exposition of the True Scripture,
and pay homage to the Ten Extremes’ Supreme Lord of the Celestial Treasure, the Ten Extremes’ Celestial Sovereigns,
and all celestial, terrestrial, luminous, and mountainous deities, as well as the spirits of all sacred officials.

Humbly hoping that the august spirits of the ancestral altars may be honored,
that the ancestral lineage’s prosperity be illuminated,
that the wandering spirits ascend to the Supreme Pole,
and that the tranquil scene of the Upper Clarity be perpetuated.
To befriend the Eight Sovereigns at the Vermilion Mound,
and to welcome the Five Emperors at the Crimson Palace.
May fragrant blessings spread like ten thousand leaves,
and graces flow like the Nine Enclosures.

The Emperor, inheriting the saintly deeds of his forebears,
with brilliance continuing the glorious lineage of virtue.
May the world endure in eternal peace,
and the cultural path achieve Great Harmony.
In harmony with the jade lamps of the Four Seasons,
and in accordance with the pearl pouches of the Five Stars.
May the common folk thrive in joy,
and the hundred grains flourish abundantly.
May the winds of the Dao prevail eternally,
and the transformations of Non-Action be fully realized.
After attaining the Dao, ascending to the Formless,
and merging with the True Essence.

---
**The Eastern Quarter**

Humbly heard, Gōumáng’s decrees govern the seasons, distributing auspicious qi from the Jade Terrace;
The Green Sovereign’s commands prevail,
fanning harmonious winds from the Jade Trees.
The Three Luminaries warm and nurture,
the Nine Regions brim with vital qi.
Feathered and scaled beings all take flight or leap.
Concentrated radiance fills the Six Harmonies,
and all living things awaken in vitality.
Bountiful blessings flow to the Eight Extremes,
and all creatures prosper in peace.

With reverence, the Emperor presents sacred symbols,
devoutly establishes the Daoist altar,
unveils the True Scripture,
and solemnly observes the fast.
Paying homage to the Eastern Quarter’s Supreme Lord of the Celestial Treasure,
the Nine Qi Celestial Sovereigns,
and the Eastern deities and sacred spirits.

Humbly hoping that the august spirits of the ancestral altars may be honored,
that the ancestral lineage’s sages be revered,
that the wandering spirits ascend to the Three Realms,
and that their forms transcend the Nine Purity.
To visit the gathered Emperors at the Star Pass,
and to escort the ranks of officials along the Celestial Path.
The Emperor, aligning with the Four Sovereigns,
and harmonizing with the Six Emperors.
May blessings nourish the Eastern Sea,
and longevity extend to the Northern Pole.
Within the world and beyond the seas,
all may bathe in the Mysterious Grace.
All sentient beings with awareness,
may eternally receive the Dao’s transformations.
Weapons and strife shall cease,
and winds and rains follow their proper course.
The Five Stars move in their appointed order,
and the myriad people thrive in peace.
After attaining the Dao, ascending to the Formless,
and merging with the True Essence.

---
**The Southern Quarter**

The Southern Quarter

---
Your humble subjects have heard that the Vermilion Fire Emperor,
opens the Moon Palace and lets forth its radiance;
the Celestial Lord of Danhu,
contains the Sun’s essence and scatters its hues.
Ascending to the Crimson Sky to manifest teachings,
the Sage attains the symbol of the One;
dwelling in the Crimson Bright to expound the scriptures,
the Son of Heaven kindles the Threefold Calendar.
Greatly spreading the Mysterious Doctrine,
establishing a model for future generations.
As the bridge for the realm and its people,
truly the vessel of the Dark and the Bright.

Now, the Emperor carries the Law of Faith,
devoutly establishes the Daoist altar,
reveals the True Texts,
and diligently observes the fasts and rituals.
We pay homage to the **Southern Quarter’s** **Formless Supreme** **Mysterious Treasure** **Celestial Venerable**,
the **Three Qi** Celestial Lords,
and the **Southern** **Divine Immortals** of all spiritual officials.
May blessings nourish the **land and grain spirits**,
and the ancestral halls of the **forebearers and sages**.
The **Five-Petaled** **Jade** canopy,
shields the **Deity** within the **Flickering Fire** court;
the **Three-Substance** **Cloud** palanquin,
wanders and observes in the **Luminous Veil** palace.
The Emperor, with **unassuming governance**,
upholds the **harmony of the world**.
He dispels the **Arcatic** beasts and **unifies all lands**,
secures the **Dragon’s** **Scriptures** and **brings peace to the Nine Realms**.
The **Three Celestial Bodies** move in appointed order,
and the **Four Seasons** regulate the years.
No alarms of **beacons and smoke signals** arise,
and **auspicious signs** descend naturally.
The populace ascends to **Ren longevity**,
and the transformations spread **Yong harmony**.
Even in the **darkest nights** and **deepest springs**,
as **creatures** flutter and stir,
they may receive the **Bright** **Blessings**,
and all enjoy their proper **things**.
After attaining the Dao, ascending to the Formless,
and merging with the True Essence.

---
The Western Quarter

Your humble subjects have heard that the **Celestial Official of Yuchen**,
holds the **Golden True** **Scriptures** of **Long Life**;
the **Floating Treasure** **Celestial Observations**,
the **Jade Emperor** suspends the **World’s** **Degrees**.
Greatly opening the **True Doctrine**,
illuminating the **Sage’s** **Legacy**.
Expanding the **Tortoise and Cauldron’s** **Mandate**,
shining the **Phoenix Calendar’s** **Venerable**.
Guiding the **multitudes of ranks** to the **Spiritual Platform**,
riding the **Rainbow** across the **vast expanse**;
leading the **sentient beings** to the **Pure Realm**,
with **winged chariot** traversing the **Supreme Clarity**.

Now, the Emperor carries the Law of Faith,
devoutly establishes the Daoist altar,
reveals the True Texts,
and diligently observes the fasts and rituals.
We pay homage to the **Western Quarter’s** **Formless Supreme** **Mysterious Treasure** **Celestial Venerable**,
the **Seven Qi** Celestial Lords,
and the **Western** **Divine Immortals** of all spiritual officials.
May blessings nourish the **land and grain spirits**,
and the ancestral halls of the **forebearers and sages**.
Treading upon the **Golden Veil** and riding the **Eclipse Chariot**,
ascending with the **Jade Palanquin** to **attain the True**.
Ascending the **Stages of the Celestial Ranks**,
prolonging the **auspicious imperial business**.
The Emperor’s **longevity** compares to **Kun Hill**,
and his **blessings** match the **Zhen** **Sacred**.
Holding the **Three Mirrors** to **rule supreme**,
extending his **care** to all lands.
The **Five Winds** and **Ten Rains**,
follow the **agricultural** **auspices**;
the **Sun of Shun** and **Clouds of Yao**,
clearly manifest in the **wise virtue**.
No **battlefronts** alarm,
and the **Yi and Xia** **awaken** in clarity.
The **Heaven and Earth** endure in **eternal purity**,
and the **hundreds of millions** align in **harmony**.
After attaining the Dao, ascending to the Formless,
and merging with the True Essence.

---
The Northern Quarter

Your humble subjects have heard that the **Pacifying Mountain** stands in **auspiciousness**,
occupying the **Yin** **region** and establishing **firmness**;

The Northern Quarter

Your humble subjects have heard that the **Pacifying Mountain** stands in **auspiciousness**,
occupying the **Yin** **region** and establishing **firmness**.

---

The **Mysterious Hill** rises in verdant splendor,
commanding the **Northern Land** to dwell in **supreme dignity**.
It generates the **One Qi** to embrace the **Primordial**,
and apportions the **Three Talents** to gather the **Dao/Way**.
In reverence, it upholds the **Heavenly Degree**,
and above safeguards the **Imperial Abode**.

Here it governs the **Gate of Crime and Blessing**,
to reveal the **Hidden and Manifest** **positions**.
Now, Your humble subjects humbly observe:
The **Emperor** bears the **Law of Faith**,
devoutly establishes the **Dao/Way Field**,
unfolds the **True Scriptures**,
and faithfully observes the **fasting rites**.

We submit and pay homage to the **Supreme Formless Lord of the Northern Quarter**,
the **Five Qi Heavenly Sovereign**,
and the **Divine Immortals** of the **Northern Land**.

We pray that the **auspicious spirits of the ancestral soil and grain**,
and the **lineage of the Supreme Saints**,
may draw **sacred essence** from the **Purple Treasury**,
and ride the **Jade Phoenix** upon the **Mysterious Shore**.

Bestowing favors upon the **hundreds of millions**,
spreading luminous blessings across **seas and mountains**.
The **Emperor’s** **virtue/power** encompasses the **Nine Territories**,
and his **sagehood** matches the **Three Absences**.

He expands the **Great Mists** to flow **enlightened care**,
and aligns with the **Pole Star** to govern the **multitudes**.
The **Golden Rays** and **Jade Arrows**,
forever dispel the **calamities of war**.
The **Heavenly Manifestations** and **Human Patterns**,
naturally fulfill the **auspices of eternal peace**.
The **Three Borders** lie tranquil and subdued,
and the **Nine Crops** flourish abundantly.
When **movement ceases** and **stillness descends**,
all **submit to the Emperor’s transformation**.
After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

The **Northeast Quarter**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **One Qi** first divides,
and the **Heavenly Dao/Way** flows without **extreme**.
The **Three Lights** begin to shine,
and **all things** take form in **proper order**.

They present the **Jade Form** in the **Yin (寅) domain**,
and scatter **Golden Radiance** in the **Kan (艮) realm**.
They assist the **auspicious destiny of the Vermilion Silk**,
and here bestow **blessings upon the Imperial Design**.
They open the **auspicious scriptures of the Green Net**,
and bring **harmony to the Heavenly Steps**.

Now, Your humble subjects humbly observe:
The **Emperor** bears the **Law of Faith**,
devoutly establishes the **Dao/Way Field**,
unfolds the **True Scriptures**,
and faithfully observes the **fasting rites**.

We submit and pay homage to the **Supreme Formless Lord of the Northeast Quarter**,
the **Heavenly Sovereign of the Sacred Breath**,
and the **Divine Immortals** of the **Northeast Land**.

We pray that the **auspicious spirits of the ancestral soil and grain**,
and the **lineage of the Supreme Saints**,
may **ascend the Green Primordial Realm**,
and ride the **True** upon the **Azure Fall Platform**.

In **hidden cultivation**, the **Divine Function** spreads,
and **blessings** flourish abundantly.
The **Emperor’s** **Six Omen-Symbols** respond to the **Manifestations**,
and **ten thousand blessings** dwell within his **heart**.

His **wise luminosity** matches the **radiance of the Dark Hare**,
and his **Heavenly Longevity** equals the **stability of Heaven and Earth**.
He proclaims **civilized virtue** abroad,
and **extends martial might** to the borders.
**Agriculture** prospers yearly,
and **war alarms** cease.
The **Nine Abysses** and **Six Realms**,
all share the **vast and boundless blessings**.
The **remote and barren lands**,
together bask in the **dew of clouds and thunder**.
After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

The **Southeast Quarter**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **Stone Gate** displays its **pendant tassels**,
and the **Divine Immortal’s** **auspicious bearing** stands solemn in the **Xun (巽) domain**.
The **Bronze Steps** tread upon the **extreme**,
and the **True Form** condenses in the **Sacred Palace**.
The **vast tides** float in the **eternal night court**,
and the **golden mists** enclose the **Mount of Eternal Life**.
The **Three Cauldrons** arrayed in **emerald green**,
and the **Nine Seas** cleansed of **luminous clarity**.

The **Emperor’s Dao/Way** aligns here,
and the **Imperial Ancestors** are revered in the **Hundred Valleys**.
Now, Your humble subjects humbly observe:
The **Emperor** bears the **Law of Faith**,
devoutly establishes the **Dao/Way Field**,
spreads the **True Scriptures**,
and faithfully observes the **fasting rites**.

We submit and pay homage to the **Supreme Formless Lord of the Southeast Quarter**,
the **Heavenly Sovereign of the Sacred Breath**,
and the **Divine Immortals** of the **Southeast Land**.

We pray that the **auspicious spirits of the ancestral soil and grain**,
and the **lineage of the Supreme Saints**,
may **cross the Whale Ford** and forever **roam**,
with **feathered retinues** in **ordered ranks**.
They may **point to the Tortoise Ridge** for **endless wandering**,
and journey through **cloud paths** in **floating mists**.

The **Emperor’s** **radiance** extends to the **Great Resonance**,
and the **distant drums** proclaim the **Royal Wind**.
He surpasses the **Agricultural Hearth** to **raise the refined**,
and **conceals the Sacred Fusions** to **unleash the Sage**.
The **Three Lights** harmonize in **order**,
and the **Five Decrees** follow **constant rule**.
The **people** embrace **peaceful harmony**,
and **attain wealth and longevity**.
The **Hidden and Manifest** **all classes**,
all share the **grace of the Mysterious Blessings**.
After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

The **Southwest Quarter**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **Golden True** governs the **auspices**,
and **illuminates the Golden Mirror** in the **Shen (申) outskirts**.
The **Jade Sage** commands the **Heavenly Seasons**,
and **clarifies the Jade Candle** in the **Kun (坤) domain**.
The **Mysterious Function** is **deeply praised**,
and **preserves the vast design** for **hundreds of millions**.
The **Supreme Virtue/power** **conceals the omen-symbols**,
and **raises the distant blessings** for **seven hundred generations**.

The **Divine Blessings** are **fully bestowed**,
and the **auspicious destiny** is **renewed**.
Now, Your humble subjects humbly observe:
The **Emperor** bears the **Law of Faith**,
devoutly establishes the **Dao/Way Altar-Field**,
unfolds the **True Scriptures**,
and faithfully observes the **fasting rites**.

We submit and pay homage to the **Supreme Formless Lord of the Southwest Quarter**,
the **Heavenly Sovereign of the Sacred Breath**,
and the **Divine Immortals** of the **Southwest Land**.

We pray that the **auspicious spirits of the ancestral soil and grain**,
and the **lineage of the Supreme Saints**,
may **ascend the Great Bright Treasury**,
and **emerge from the Hidden Retreat**.

We may **extend the Emperor’s blessings** to **Sun’s Strategy**,
and **confer the Mysterious Nurturing** upon the **Imperial Household**.
The **Emperor’s** **longevity** compares to **Kun Hill**,
and his **blessings** match the **radiance of the Sun and Moon**.

He **aligns with the Heavenly Virtue/power** to **rule supreme**,
and **pairs with the Earthly Vehicle** to **bring eternal peace**.
The **Divine Terrace** and **Imperial Register**,
clearly manifest in the **auspicious years**.
The **bows and quivers** are **laid aside**,
and **forever attain the Supreme Reason**.
All **living beings** fulfill their **nature**,
and **ten thousand nations** again **prosper**.
After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

The **Northwest Quarter**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **Golden Enclosure** stretches a **thousand li**,
and **supports the Imperial Extremes** in **high residence**.

---

**The Northwest Quarter**
The **Nine-Layered Jade Gate** stands tall upon the **Heavenly Expanse** as a **bulwark**.
It gazes upon the **Three Celestial Formations** from **Kun Hill**,
and commands the **Six Seasons** in the **Direction of the Steward**.

Here lies the **True Essence’s** abode,
the **true standard of the Imperial Dao/Way**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **sacred silks and jade seals of faith**,
**Dragon Tablets and fragrant blossoms**,
unveiling the **True Scriptures** and performing **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Qi-Heavenly Lord**, and the **Divine Spirits of the Northwest**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Emperor rides the Qiu Dragon** upon the **Celestial Path**,
and **solemnly marshals the Feathered Guard** at the **Cloud Crossroads**.

He **bestows rewards upon the Nine Pure Ones**,
and **transmits edicts to the Ten Thousand Leaves**.

The Emperor **concentrates the flowing essence of the Dao/Way**,
and **points to the Mysterious Orchard** to **perpetuate his reverence**.

Bearing the **Celestial Screen**, he **rides the Heavenly Vehicle**,
and **aligns with the Jade Balance** to **eternally uphold rectitude**.

His **transformations return to purity and tranquility**,
and the **years bring abundant harvests**.

**Blades and arrows do not fly**,
and **auspicious omens gather abundantly**.

All **sentient beings with awareness**
**harmonize with the True Path**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

**The Upper Realm**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **Supreme Dao/Way** refines its **Essence**,
and **Heaven alone is the greatest**.

It **covers the Three Realms without governance**,
and **embraces the Five Directions with lofty dominion**.

Its **manifestations are without partiality**,
and its **movements know no rest**.

It **nurtures prosperity and brilliance**,
to **bless the Imperial Design**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **seals of faith**,
**arranges the ritual platforms**,
unveils the **True Scriptures**,
and performs **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Jade Capital Mysterious Metropolis Purple Micro Gold Gate Three Pure Ones of the Three Realms Supreme Venerable**,
and the **Divine Spirits of the Upper Realm**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Rainbow Banners rise high**,
soaring through the **Three Realms**;
the **Crane-Drawn Chariot ascends again**,
wandering freely above the **Six Voids**.

The Emperor **embodies the Original and establishes the Pole**,
and **rides the Dao/Way upon the Celestial Map**.

He **transcends the winds of the Three Five**,
and **transmits his vast influence to the Ten Thousand Ages**.

He **shines alongside the Comet**,
and **matches the Nine and Six** in **eternal integrity**.

All **ten thousand dwellings are at peace**,
and **myriad people prosper in safety**.

**Weapons are not wielded**,
and **cultural virtue is deeply trusted**.

Both **manifest and subtle beings**
**ascend together into the Dao’s domain**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

**The Lower Realm**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **great bearing of the Earth**,
truly lies in **Kun’s virtue**.

It **spans the Eight Strings** with **boundaries**,
and **gives birth to ten thousand kinds** without **partiality**.

The **Tortoise Pool and Peng Lake** divide and **guard firmly**,
while the **Ten Mountains and Five Peaks** **extend their sacred influence**.

It **proclaims the Great Treasure in the Central Capital**,
and **gathers all blessings in the Upper Realm**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **seals of faith**,
**piously establishes the Dao/Way’s platform**,
unveils the **True Scriptures**,
and performs **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Twelve Celestial Worthies**,
the **Nine Palace Immortals**,
and the **Divine Spirits of the Without-Extremes World’s Mountains and Waters**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Three Mountains and Eight Caverns** **distant honor the Imperial Excursions**,
while **Dan Mountain and Qing Hill** **ascend to the True Realm**.

The Emperor **accomplishes clear and wise virtue**,
and **eternally governs the Central Sky**.

He **wields the Jade Dipper to soothe and rule**,
and **opens the Jade Diagram to maintain solemnity**.

The **Three Stars shine brightly**,
**eternally encircling the North Celestial Pole’s reverence**;
the **Nine Terrains stretch vast**,
**fully blessing the Southern Mountains’ longevity**.

**Weapons are not raised**,
and **grain and crops flourish**.

Both **moving and still, subtle and manifest beings**
**constantly attain Dao/Way transformation**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

The **Golden Register Ritual of Fasting and Repentance** is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 玄丘耸翠，当北陆以居尊。 生一气以含元，分三才而会道。 仰扶天度，上保宸居。 爰司罪福之门，以显幽明之位。 今谨有皇帝赍持法信，虔设道场，披露真文，奉修斋直。 归命北方无极太上灵宝天尊，五气天君，北乡神仙诸灵官。 伏冀社稷尊灵，宗祧上圣，挹灵津於紫府，御琼凤於玄洲。 贻贶亿千，传光海岳。 皇帝功包九有，圣叶三无。 廓溟海以流恩，并极星而御众。 金芒玉弩，永消兵甲之灾； 天象人文，自契升平之运。 三边静肃，九稼丰秾。 动息飞沈，咸承景化。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 东北方 臣等伏闻，一气初分，天道运而无极； 三光肇映，品物形而有伦。 呈玉相於寅方，散金辉於艮域。 翼朱绨之景命，爰福帝图； 开绿错之祯文，以康天步。 今谨有皇帝赍持法信，虔设道场，披露真文，奉修斋直。 归命东北方无极太上灵宝天尊，梵气天君，东北乡神仙诸灵官。 伏冀社稷尊灵，宗祧列圣。 飞步於青元之境，乘真於碧落之台。 潜播神功，允昌休祚。 皇帝六符应象，万寓宅心。 睿明俾乌兔之晖，天寿等乾坤之固。 外宣文德，旁振武威。 稼穑有年，烽烟罢警。 九幽六趣，同均浩荡之恩； 绝域穷荒，共沐云雷之泽。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 东南方 臣等伏闻，石阙端旒，俨仙姿於巽境； 铜阶践极，凝真相於梵宫。 洪涛浮不夜之庭，金雾锁长生之岳。 三壶列翠，九海澄光。 齐帝道於兹方，顺朝宗於百谷。 今谨有皇帝赍持法信，虔设道场，敷露真文，奉修斋直。 归命东南方无极太上灵宝天尊，梵气天君，东南乡神仙诸灵官。 伏冀社稷尊灵，宗祧先圣。 涉鲸津而永骛，羽卫参差； 指鳌岭以长游，云程缥缈。 皇帝光敷大号，遐鼓皇风。 超农燧以扬徽，掩轩融而纵圣。 三光调理，五纬顺常。 俗致和平，人登富寿。 幽明庶类，同洽玄恩。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 西南方 臣等伏闻，金真抚运，朗金镜於申郊； 玉圣御时，明玉烛於坤境。 玄功幽赞，保亿载之宏图； 至德潜符，扬七百之遐祚。 神休克被，景命惟新。 今谨有皇帝赍持法信，虔设坛场，披露真文，奉修斋直。 归命西南方无极太上灵宝天尊，梵气天君，西南乡神仙诸灵官。 伏冀社稷尊灵，宗祧昭穆。 登大明之府，出沈默之乡。 延嘉贶於孙谋，霈玄滋於帝室。 皇帝嵩衡比寿，日月齐华。 运乾德以君临，配坤舆而安静。 神皋帝籍，自表於有年； 偃革弢弓，永臻於至理。 群生遂性，万国又康。 得道之后，升入无形，与道合真。 西北方 臣等伏闻，金墉千里，拱宸极以高居；

**The Northwest Quarter**
The **Nine-Layered Jade Gate** stands tall upon the **Heavenly Expanse** as a **bulwark**.
It gazes upon the **Three Celestial Formations** from **Kun Hill**,
and commands the **Six Seasons** in the **Direction of the Steward**.

Here lies the **True Essence’s** abode,
the **true standard of the Imperial Dao/Way**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **sacred silks and jade seals of faith**,
**Dragon Tablets and fragrant blossoms**,
unveiling the **True Scriptures** and performing **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Qi-Heavenly Lord**, and the **Divine Spirits of the Northwest**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Emperor rides the Qiu Dragon** upon the **Celestial Path**,
and **solemnly marshals the Feathered Guard** at the **Cloud Crossroads**.

He **bestows rewards upon the Nine Pure Ones**,
and **transmits edicts to the Ten Thousand Leaves**.

The Emperor **concentrates the flowing essence of the Dao/Way**,
and **points to the Mysterious Orchard** to **perpetuate his reverence**.

Bearing the **Celestial Screen**, he **rides the Heavenly Vehicle**,
and **aligns with the Jade Balance** to **eternally uphold rectitude**.

His **transformations return to purity and tranquility**,
and the **years bring abundant harvests**.

**Blades and arrows do not fly**,
and **auspicious omens gather abundantly**.

All **sentient beings with awareness**
**harmonize with the True Path**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

**The Upper Realm**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **Supreme Dao/Way** refines its **Essence**,
and **Heaven alone is the greatest**.

It **covers the Three Realms without governance**,
and **embraces the Five Directions with lofty dominion**.

Its **manifestations are without partiality**,
and its **movements know no rest**.

It **nurtures prosperity and brilliance**,
to **bless the Imperial Design**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **seals of faith**,
**arranges the ritual platforms**,
unveils the **True Scriptures**,
and performs **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Jade Capital Mysterious Metropolis Purple Micro Gold Gate Three Pure Ones of the Three Realms Supreme Venerable**,
and the **Divine Spirits of the Upper Realm**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Rainbow Banners rise high**,
soaring through the **Three Realms**;
the **Crane-Drawn Chariot ascends again**,
wandering freely above the **Six Voids**.

The Emperor **embodies the Original and establishes the Pole**,
and **rides the Dao/Way upon the Celestial Map**.

He **transcends the winds of the Three Five**,
and **transmits his vast influence to the Ten Thousand Ages**.

He **shines alongside the Comet**,
and **matches the Nine and Six** in **eternal integrity**.

All **ten thousand dwellings are at peace**,
and **myriad people prosper in safety**.

**Weapons are not wielded**,
and **cultural virtue is deeply trusted**.

Both **manifest and subtle beings**
**ascend together into the Dao’s domain**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

---

**The Lower Realm**
Your humble subjects have heard that the **great bearing of the Earth**,
truly lies in **Kun’s virtue**.

It **spans the Eight Strings** with **boundaries**,
and **gives birth to ten thousand kinds** without **partiality**.

The **Tortoise Pool and Peng Lake** divide and **guard firmly**,
while the **Ten Mountains and Five Peaks** **extend their sacred influence**.

It **proclaims the Great Treasure in the Central Capital**,
and **gathers all blessings in the Upper Realm**.

Now, with **filial sincerity**, the Emperor presents **seals of faith**,
**piously establishes the Dao/Way’s platform**,
unveils the **True Scriptures**,
and performs **ritual fasting**.

We **prostrate and submit** to the **Supreme Without-Extremes, Most High Precious Treasure Celestial Venerable**,
the **Twelve Celestial Worthies**,
the **Nine Palace Immortals**,
and the **Divine Spirits of the Without-Extremes World’s Mountains and Waters**.

We humbly pray that the **Altars of Soil and Grain** may be **august and sacred**,
and the **lineage of the Sacred Ancestors** may **shine with virtue**.

The **Three Mountains and Eight Caverns** **distant honor the Imperial Excursions**,
while **Dan Mountain and Qing Hill** **ascend to the True Realm**.

The Emperor **accomplishes clear and wise virtue**,
and **eternally governs the Central Sky**.

He **wields the Jade Dipper to soothe and rule**,
and **opens the Jade Diagram to maintain solemnity**.

The **Three Stars shine brightly**,
**eternally encircling the North Celestial Pole’s reverence**;
the **Nine Terrains stretch vast**,
**fully blessing the Southern Mountains’ longevity**.

**Weapons are not raised**,
and **grain and crops flourish**.

Both **moving and still, subtle and manifest beings**
**constantly attain Dao/Way transformation**.

After attaining the **Dao/Way**, ascending to the **Formless**,
and merging with the **True Essence**.

The **Golden Register Ritual of Fasting and Repentance** is now complete.

Your humble subjects have heard that the **Golden Enclosure** stretches a **thousand li**,
